tool_description: Cross-references multiple identity data points to detect inconsistencies and calculate overall identity coherence across all verification sources.

identity_data_sources.description: Array of identity data source types being cross-referenced

primary_name.description: Primary full name from main identity document

primary_address.description: Primary address from main identity document

primary_ssn.description: Social Security Number from primary source

primary_dob.description: Date of birth from primary source in YYYY-MM-DD format

secondary_names.description: Array of names from other sources for comparison

secondary_addresses.description: Array of addresses from other sources

secondary_ssns.description: Array of SSNs from other sources

secondary_dobs.description: Array of birth dates from other sources

tolerance_days.description: Acceptable variance in days for date comparisons

error_messages: Insufficient data sources: Provide at least 2 different identity data sources for cross-referencing.
Invalid date format: Ensure all dates are in YYYY-MM-DD format.
Mismatched array lengths: Secondary data arrays should align with the number of sources being compared.
Invalid tolerance range: tolerance_days must be between 0 and 365.
Missing primary identity data: All primary identity fields (name, address, SSN, DOB) are required.
usage: Provide primary identity information from the main source and secondary data arrays from other verification sources. Specify data source types and tolerance for date variations.

name_consistency.description: Whether names are consistent across sources

address_consistency.description: Whether addresses are consistent across sources

ssn_consistency.description: Whether SSNs match across all sources

dob_consistency.description: Whether dates of birth are consistent

confidence_level.description: Overall confidence level: high, medium, low
